dict.acceptation: 新规定限制；不受新条例；

sent.orig: In the dining room of my grandfather's house stood a massive grandfather clock.
sent.trans: 在我祖父家里的餐厅中，摆着一座大型的落地大摆钟。

sent.orig: IN the dining room of grandfather's house stood a massive grandfather clock.
sent.trans: 爷爷家的餐厅中有一座巨大的老爷种。

sent.orig: Mr. Smith inherited a big company from his grandfather and ran very well now.
sent.trans: 史密斯先生从他祖父那里继承了一家大公司而且现在把它经营得很好。

sent.orig: How about a date with your grandfather?
Well, it was a farmhouse; we lived with my grandfather and he and sold horses.
sent.trans: 嗯，那是一处农庄，我们和我的祖父住在一起，而他以买卖马匹为生。
